title: FOR THE FIFTH TIME RIOT JADE FANG CASSIOPEIA'S E PARTICLE IS BUGGED
body: HER NEW GAMEPLAY IS TWIN FANG CENTRIC HOW HAVE YOU NOT FIXED THIS YET WHAT THE HELL IVE REPORTED THIS BUG LIKE FIVE TIMES CAN YOU FUCKING FIX IT ALREADY THANKS

replies.body:
The more information you can provide in a bug report, the more helpful it is for us. :] 

Could you describe what you mean by 'bugged', please?

FINALLY
I'll just link you to my huge bug thread that I made and nothing was fixed
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/8q9EF7R6-cassiopeia-mega-bug-thread

These bugs have been there since patch 4.17
Like seriously c'mon

No need to be rude. :3 

Looks like there might be a missing particle that's causing the blue bit to appear during Jade Fang Cass's Twin Fang ability. We'll take care of it!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=urPYmvII,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T23:51:21.226+0000)
>
> No need to be rude. :3 
> 
> Looks like there might be a missing particle that's causing the blue bit to appear during Jade Fang Cass's Twin Fang ability. We'll take care of it!

I clap for you. A customer is screaming at you in the face and you just politely take care of the issue. This really is what I love about riot
Which in actual reality, he was taking the picture of OP's comment and send it to his dear friend Lyte. Oh the drama O.o

i thought that was intentional for the sake of CLARITY

i looks good imo
I don't care if I was being rude or not. I have been reporting these bugs since patch 4.17 and "coincidentally" they only got noticed when I was being "rude"
